PSCT.Base:
2+ Level 2 monsters
You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish it until your opponent's End Phase. If this card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card: You can target banished monsters, up to the number of materials this card had; shuffle them into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Onibimaru Soul Sweeper" once per turn.
